name: (Unisex) American Apparel Flex Fleece Zip Hoody
description:
13% off retail price ($46)

American Apparel no longer sells these hoodies without a printed logo on it, but I managed to find a supplier that sells AUTHENTIC American Apparel hoodies. I have ALL the colors you can find on AA's site.

When ordering, please leave a note upon payment with what color you'd like.

List of colors:
http://i52.tinypic.com/14lt315.png

Size chart for this particular item:
http://i55.tinypic.com/2wcfxqe.png

===========================

Shipping Info:

Where I ship - I go to USPS (United States Postal Service) to ship out my goods.

Time - The hoodies could take anywhere from 7-14 days until they get to your home.

Payment - Shipping is $2 within the U.S. and $5 to ship outside of the U.S.
